content: Do we have anything urgent? David's unavailable to chair and I'll have to head to the airport 15 minutes into the call. I can continue to chair for 30 minutes after that while in transit, but it's simpler to cancel if we don't have anything urgent.
I don't have anything except the process issue around normative contnetn
I won't be joining any more calls before the meeting
Process issue isn't really an issue - we just need to let WGs know they're allowed to consider non-ballot tracker items that might lead to substantive change - no?
well, yes, but any substantiative changes that arise this way must go through re-ballot
Any substantive changes that arrive in any way must go through re-ballot

Essentially the only difference between balloted and non-balloted comments is that the WG is under obligation to reconcile the balloted ones. However, from a good/reasonable practice perspective, they're effectively obligated to resolve all comments that could result in substantive change received before whatever cutoff we set for Aug. ballot prep.
so I think that we should point this on on co-chairs list since at least one committee has not twigged to their obligations here
Just a note that Austin is planning to attend the beginning of the call with some issues from SGB this morning.
